about_the_game:
Support this project by adding it to your WISHLIST and reposting on your social networks! We are creating it with a small independent team.

Chapter I in STEAM here if you have not yet touched this unusual world.
But you can immediately play Chapter II - inside there is a small intro with backstory.

“I Know This Place..?” Chapter II – this is a vibe mystical TRANS-MEDIA adventure with deep meaning in our strange game world, where you will see unusual plot twists, amazing locations and quirky characters.
And all of this can be influenced by you personally, because the plot of the chapters develops taking into account the votes of the players.

In addition to the chapters of the game, our universe will be revealed in short films (watch in the game main menu), old audio recordings and comics. And thanks to the introduction of ARG - games in alternative reality - we connect the world of the game and the real one.

What did scientist Vladimir Mashkov do and where is he? What's wrong with his apartment and the house in general. Such questions will torment you after visiting his strange apartment in Chapter I.

In Chapter II we will leave Vladimir's apartment in search of answers, encountering even more questions along the way. We are starting to move away from complete linearity, and are also introducing more opportunities for our players and viewers to add items and (attention) entire story locations to the game!

Do you have ideas for super strange plot twists, intriguing puzzles, and want to influence the plot of the next chapters?

Want to add your own memorable photo with a caption, or a photo of your grandmother to the game? Maybe some kind of memorable item, for example a book that your father loved to read as a child?

Or do you want to see in reality a children's room that no longer exists in real life? Grandfather's old car? Your father's garage or your grandmother's country house, in which a short story will unfold that you can write yourself with our help?

All this will now be available!
As you already know, players can add items by winning competitions in our public and
or by subscribing to our boost. Other players will see your item in the game, and even the history and information about it. But we decided to go further: in Chapter II you will be able to get your own location according to your idea and plot. Details inside the menu.

Jump into our friendly community in Telegram ( @IKnowThisPlace) and we’ll show you together this unusual project to the world!

We are domestic indie developers, the SameFrame association. We create worlds while sitting in a small town N, without budgets, but with awe and love =)

Therefore, we are very grateful to your wonderful reviews about Chapter I, filled with sincere emotions about the game. Special thanks to Sony representatives for their warm feedback about our game at the exhibition in Lisbon.



We thank everyone who supports and believes in us, we thank EpicGames and Nvidia for their technologies, we thank our parents, we thank RBL LABS for their help with the pilot episode.

Special thanks to Boosty subscribers:
P1gVo1ce
Evgeny Ishin
Anka_Tec9
Maksin
Glebory
detailed_description:
"iKnow" token

The project will have a close connection with the iKnow token (TON network). You can receive tokens for free as a gift by finding something in the game, or by completing the entire game and filling out the voting form. Right now you can get free IKnow tokens in the official project public.
Why iKnow tokens are needed in the future:
-Large holders will be able to receive a percentage of our company’s profits
-You can receive tokens for free and sell them on the exchange
-Tokens help us become independent developers and create I Know This Place as we see it
-Token holders will be able to create votes (DAO) themselves, which will influence the plot and content of the game
-Token holders will be able to receive chapters for free. Token holders are treated like paid subscribers.
-Creating locations based on your memories. Your grandmother's house from the village? Dad's garage? All this can be added to our game

name: I Know This Place..? (chapter II)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 1xxx or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 2xxx or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

reviews:
“Reviews in Steam ( chapter I )”
9/10 – Steam Community
short_description: Chapter II of an extremely unusual trans-media franchise with game and short film chapters. Players influence the plot of the chapters and can leave their real-life items in the chapters. Game+Short films+visual novel. Ultra-deep meaning, nostalgic references, vibe mysticism.
